attributes.additional_details: The security and future of the country is at stake. There is no clarity. Their is total reliance of people taking personal responsibility.
attributes.background: We need proper leadership in this time of crisis and it is evident that Rt Hon Boris Johnson does not have the capacity to lead the country through this crisis. Today, Mar 19th, he has avoided any decisions, given no straightforward information and spun false hope about testing and antibody tests.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, which includes calling for a Minister to lose their job.

We have published a petition calling for an emergency National Unity Government, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301563

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
